S06n557:4: ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhakūṭe parvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ,
S06n557:5: sarvairarhadbhiḥ kṣīṇāsravairniḥkleśairvaśībhūtaiḥ suvimuktacittaiḥ suvimuktaprajñairājñairājāneyairmahānāgaiḥ kṛtakṛtyaiḥ kṛtakaraṇīyairapahṛtabhārairanuprāptasvakārthaiḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaiḥ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittaiḥ sarvacetovaśiparamapāramiprāptairekaṃ pudgalaṃ sthāpayitvā yaduta āyuṣmantamānandam ||
S06n557:6: tatra khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthaviramāmantrayate sma-pratibhātu te subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāmārabhya yathā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitā niryāyuriti ||
S06n557:7: atha khalvāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaitadabhavat-kimayamāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthavira ātmīyena svakena prajñāpratibhānabalādhānena svakena prajñāpratibhānabalādhiṣṭhānena bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāmupadekṣyati utāho buddhānubhāveneti?
S06n557:8: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbuddhānubhāvena āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya imamevarūpaṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat-yatkiṃcidāyuṣman śāriputra bhagavataḥ śrāvakā bhāṣante deśayanti upadiśanti udīrayanti prakāśayanti saṃprakāśayanti,
S06n557:12: tatra dharmadeśanāyāṃ śikṣamāṇāste tāṃ dharmatāṃ sākṣātkurvanti dhārayanti,
S06n557:13: tāṃ dharmatāṃ sākṣātkṛtya dhārayitvā yadyadeva bhāṣante,
S06n557:20: tathāgatadharmadeśanāyā eva āyuṣman śāriputra eṣa niṣyandaḥ yatte kulaputrā upadiśantastāṃ dharmatāṃ dharmatayā na virodhayanti ||
S06n557:21: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbuddhānubhāvena bhagavantametadavocat-yadbhagavānevamāha-pratibhātu te subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāmārabhya yathā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ niryāyuriti |
S06n557:24: nāhaṃ bhagavaṃstaṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yaduta bodhisattva iti |
S06n557:25: tamapyahaṃ bhagavan dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi yaduta prajñāpāramitā nāma |
S06n557:26: so'haṃ bhagavan bodhisattvaṃ vā bodhisattvadharmaṃ vā avindan anupalabhamāno'samanupaśyan,
S06n557:27: prajñāpāramitāmapyavindan anupalabhamāno'samanupaśyan katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmavavadiṣyāmi anuśāsiṣyāmi?
S06n557:28: api tu khalu punarbhagavan sacedevaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe deśyamāne upadiśyamāne bodhisattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na viṣīdati na viṣādamāpadyate,
S06n557:37: punaraparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāvayatā evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yathā asau śikṣyamāṇastenāpi bodhicittena na manyeta |
S06n557:41: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte asti taccittaṃ yaccittamacittam?
S06n557:42: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra yā acittatā,
S06n557:43: tatra acittatāyāmastitā vā nāstitā vā vidyate vā upalabhyate vā?
S06n557:45: subhūtirāha-sacedāyuṣman śāriputra tatra acittatāyāmastitā vā nāstitā vā na vidyate vā nopalabhyate vā,
S06n557:46: api nu te yukta eṣa paryanuyogo bhavati yadāyuṣmān śāriputra evamāha-asti taccittaṃ yaccittamacittamiti?
S06n557:47: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-kā punareṣā āyuṣman subhūte acittatā ?
S06n557:49: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāramadāt-sādhu sādhvāyuṣman subhūte |
S06n557:50: yathāpi nāma tvaṃ bhagavatā araṇāvihāriṇāmagratāyāṃ nirdiṣṭo nirdiśasi |
S06n557:53: śrāvakabhūmāvapi śikṣitukāmena iyameva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā |
S06n557:55: pratyekabuddhabhūmāvapi śikṣitukāmena iyameva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā |
S06n557:57: bodhisattvabhūmāvapi śikṣitukāmena iyameva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā |
S06n557:60: ihaiva hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvabodhisattvadharmā upadiṣṭāḥ,
S06n557:62: anuttarāyāmapi samyaksaṃbodhau śikṣitukāmena iyameva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā |
S06n557:65: ihaiva hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvabuddha dharmā upadiṣṭāḥ,
S06n557:67: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-yo'haṃ bhagavan etadeva bodhisattvanāmadheyaṃ na vedmi nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06n557:68: prajñāpāramitāmapi na vedmi nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi |
S06n557:69: so'haṃ bhagavan etadeva bodhisattvanāmadheyamavindan anupalabhamāno'samanupaśyan prajñāpāramitāmapi avindan anupalabhamāno'samanupaśyan katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmavavadiṣyāmi anuśāsiṣyāmi?
S06n557:71: yo'haṃ vastvavindan anupalabhamāno'samanupaśyan nāmadheyamātreṇa āyavyayaṃ kuryāṃ yaduta bodhisattva iti |
S06n557:72: api tu khalu punarbhagavaṃstadapi nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam |
S06n557:75: evaṃ tannāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam |
S06n557:76: sacedbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāṃ cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na viṣīdati na viṣādamāpadyate,
S06n557:80: adhimucyate'dhyāśayena avirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā veditavyaḥ,
S06n557:83: punaraparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayatā na rūpe sthātavyaṃ na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu,
S06n557:94: na hi abhisaṃskāre caran prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S06n557:97: aparipūrayamāṇaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ na niryāsyati sarvajñatāyāmaparigṛhītaṃ parigṛhṇan |
S06n557:108: evaṃ hyatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam |
S06n557:109: ayaṃ ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvadharmāparigṛhīto nāma samādhirvipulaḥ puraskṛtaḥ apramāṇaniyato'sādhāraṇaḥ |
S06n557:114: tatra hi śreṇikaḥ parivrājakaḥ sarvajñajñāne adhimucya śraddhānusārī prādeśikena jñānenāvatīrṇaḥ |
S06n557:116: evaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān |
S06n557:129: so'tra sarvatra śraddhānusārī sarvajñajñāne dharmatāṃ pramāṇīkṛtya evamadhimukta iti |
S06n557:134: iyamapi bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā veditavyā yadrūpaṃ na parigṛhṇīte |
S06n557:139: tasmādiyamapi bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā veditavyā ||
S06n557:140: punaraparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayatā evamupaparīkṣitavyamevamupanidhyātavyam-katamaiṣā prajñāpāramitā?
S06n557:142: kiṃ yo dharmo na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06n557:144: sacedevamupaparīkṣamāṇaḥ evamupanidhyāyan nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na viṣīdati na viṣādamāpadyate,
S06n557:149: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-kiṃ kāraṇamāyuṣman subhūte avirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā veditavyaḥ?
S06n557:151: evaṃ yadā vedanaiva saṃjñaiva saṃskārā eva,
S06n557:155: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat-etametadāyuṣman śāriputra evametat |
S06n557:165: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'tra śikṣiṣyate,
S06n557:172: evaṃ carata āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvajñatā āsannībhavati |
S06n557:176: evaṃ ca punarāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvajñatāyā āsannībhavati ||
S06n557:195: ahaṃ bodhisattva iti hyupalambha eva sa carati |
S06n557:214: ahaṃ bodhisattva iti hyupalambha eva sa carati |
S06n557:220: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-kathaṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām?
S06n557:221: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat-sacedāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpe carati,
S06n557:230: evaṃ sacenna vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu |
S06n557:246: carāmi ca na carāmi ceti nopaiti,
S06n557:247: naiva carāmi na na carāmīti nopaiti,
S06n557:250: cariṣyāmi ca na cariṣyāmi ceti nopaiti,
S06n557:256: anenaiva samādhinā viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate ||
S06n557:257: buddhānubhāvena āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthavira evamāha-vyākṛto'yaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06n557:260: na ca tena samādhinā manyate-ahaṃ samāhitaḥ,
S06n557:265: evaṃ tasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na saṃvidyate ||
S06n557:266: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-katamenāyuṣman subhūte samādhinā viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairvyākriyate'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
S06n557:270: tamapi hi sa kulaputraḥ samādhiṃ na jānāti,
S06n557:272: āyuṣmān śāriputra āha-na jānāti na saṃjānīte ityāyuṣman subhūte vadasi?
S06n557:273: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha-na jānāti na saṃjānīte ityāyuṣman śāriputra vadāmi |
S06n557:275: avidyamānatvena tasya samādhestaṃ samādhiṃ na jānāti na saṃjānīte |
S06n557:276: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāramadāt-sādhu sādhu subhūte |
S06n557:282: evaṃ hi śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate ||
S06n557:283: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat-evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate?
S06n557:284: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat-evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate ||
S06n557:285: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat-evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ katamasmin dharme śikṣate?
S06n557:286: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kasmiṃściddharme śikṣate |
S06n557:288: na hi te śāriputra dharmāstathā saṃvidyante yathā bālapṛthagjanā aśrutavanto'bhiniviṣṭāḥ |
S06n557:289: āyuṣmān śāriputra āha-kathaṃ tarhi te bhagavan saṃvidyante?
S06n557:295: te tān kalpayitvā dvayorantayoḥ saktāḥ tān dharmānna jānanti na paśyanti |
S06n557:297: kalpayitvā dvāvantāvabhiniviśante abhiniviśya tannidānamupalambhaṃ niśritya atītān dharmān kalpayanti,
S06n557:299: pratyutpannān dharmān kalpayanti te kalpayitvā nāmarūpe'bhiniviṣṭāḥ |
S06n557:301: te tānasaṃvidyamānān sarvadharmān kalpayanto yathābhūtaṃ mārgaṃ na jānanti na paśyanti |
S06n557:304: tena te bālā iti saṃjñāṃ gacchanti |
S06n557:306: na khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā kaṃciddharmamabhiniviśante ||
S06n557:307: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat-evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate?
S06n557:308: bhagavānāha-evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāmapi na śikṣate |
S06n557:309: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmeṣu śikṣate |
S06n557:310: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06n557:313: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-yo bhagavan evaṃ paripṛcchet-kimayaṃ māyāpuruṣāḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣiṣyate,
S06n557:316: tasya bhagavan evaṃ paripṛcchataḥ kathaṃ nirdeṣṭavyaṃ syāt?
S06n557:317: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-tena hi subhūte tvāmevātra pratiprakṣyāmi |
S06n557:321: bhagavānetadavocat-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte anyā sā māyā,
S06n557:330: na hi bhagavan anyā sā māyā anyattadrūpam |
S06n557:333: na hi bhagavan anyā sā māyā anyā sā vedanā,
S06n557:334: anyā sā saṃjñā anye te saṃskārāḥ |
S06n557:335: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā eva bhagavan māyā,
S06n557:337: na bhagavan anyā sā māyā anyattadvijñānam |
S06n557:340: bhagavānāha-tatkiṃ manyase subhūte atraiṣāṃ saṃjñā samajñā prajñaptirvyavahāraḥ pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu yaduta bodhisattva iti?
S06n557:343: tena hi bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñapāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇena māyāpuruṣeṇeva śikṣitavyaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
S06n557:345: sa eva hi bhagavan māyāpuruṣo dhārayitavyo yaduta pañcopādānaskandhāḥ |
S06n557:347: tathā hi bhagavan māyopamaṃ rūpamuktaṃ bhagavatā |
S06n557:348: yacca rūpaṃ tatṣaḍindriyaṃ te pañca skandhāḥ |
S06n557:349: tathā hi bhagavan māyopamā vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā uktāḥ |
S06n557:350: tathā hi bhagavan māyopamaṃ vijñānamuktaṃ bhagavatā |
S06n557:351: yacca vijñānaṃ tatṣaḍindriyaṃ te pañca skandhāḥ |
S06n557:352: mā bhagavan navayānasaṃprasthitā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrutvā utrasiṣuḥ saṃtrasiṣuḥ saṃtrāsamāpatsyante |
S06n557:353: bhagavānāha-yadi subhūte navayānasaṃprasthitā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ pāpamitrahastagatā bhaviṣyanti,
S06n557:355: atha cetsubhūte navayānasaṃprasthitā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kalyāṇamitrahastagatā bhaviṣyanti,
S06n557:357: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-kāni punarbhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni?
S06n557:363: imāni subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya mahāyānasaṃprasthitasya mahāyānasamārūḍhasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni |
S06n557:364: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-yadbhagavānevamāha-imāni subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya mahāyānasaṃprasthitasya mahāyānasamārūḍhasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyānīti |
S06n557:366: tatra bodhisattva iti bhagavan kaḥ padārtha?
S06n557:369: sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'saktatāyāṃ śikṣate |
S06n557:370: sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nubodhanārthena asaktatāyāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate |
S06n557:371: bodhyarthena tu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva ityucyate |
S06n557:373: kena kāraṇena bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva ityucyate?
S06n557:376: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat-mamāpi bhagavan pratibhātiyenārthena bodhisattvo mahāsattva ityucyate |
S06n557:377: bhagavānāha-pratibhātu te śāriputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase |
S06n557:378: āyuṣmān śāriputra āha-mahatyā ātmadṛṣṭyāḥ sattvadṛṣṭyāḥ jīvadṛṣṭyāḥ pudgala dṛṣṭyāḥ bhavadṛṣṭyāḥ vibhavadṛṣṭyāḥ ucchedadṛṣṭyāḥ śāśvatadṛṣṭyāḥ svakāyadṛṣṭyāḥ,
S06n557:381: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-mamāpi bhagavan pratibhāti yenārthena bodhisattvo mahāsattva ityucyate |
S06n557:382: bhagavānāha-pratibhātu te subhūte yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase |
S06n557:384: yadapi tadbhagavan bodhicittaṃ sarvajñatācittamanāsravaṃ cittamasamaṃ cittaṃ asamasamaṃ cittamasādhāraṇaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ,
S06n557:390: tenārthena bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati ||
S06n557:391: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-kena kāraṇena āyuṣman subhūte tatrāpi citte asakto'paryāpannaḥ?
S06n557:393: śāriputra āha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte asti taccittaṃ yaccittamacittam?
S06n557:394: subhūtirāha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra tatra acittatāyāmastitā vā nāstitā vā vidyate vā upalabhyate vā?
S06n557:396: subhūtirāha-tadyadi āyuṣman śāriputra tatra acittatāyāmastitā vā nāstitā vā na vidyate vā nopalabhyate vā,
S06n557:399: yathāpi nāma tvaṃ bhagavatā araṇāvihāriṇāmagratāyāṃ nirdiṣṭo nirdiśasi ||
S06n557:400: atha khalvāyuṣmān pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputro bhagavantametadavocat-mahāsattvo mahāsattva iti yadidaṃ bhagavannucyate,
S06n557:403: tasmātsa mahāsattvo mahāsattva iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati ||
S06n557:404: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddho mahāyānasaṃnaddha iti yadidaṃ bhagavannucyate,
S06n557:405: kiyatā bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddho bhavati ?
S06n557:406: bhagavānāha-iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ bhavati-aprameyā mayā sattvāḥ parinirvāpayitavyā iti |
S06n557:408: na ca te santi yairye parinirvāpayitavyā iti |
S06n557:410: na ca sa kaścitsattvo yaḥ parinirvṛto yena ca parinirvāpito bhavati |
S06n557:413: yathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākaro vā māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe mahāntaṃ janakāyamabhinirmimīte |
S06n557:415: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu tatra kenacitkaściddhato vā mṛto vā nāśito vā antarhito vā?
S06n557:417: bhagavānāha-evameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'prameyānasaṃkhyeyān sattvān parinirvāpayati |
S06n557:418: na ca sa kaścitsattvo yaḥ parinirvṛto yena ca parinirvāpito bhavati |
S06n557:419: sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ nirdeśamevaṃ nirdiśyamānaṃ śrutvā notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate,
S06n557:420: iyatā ayaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddho veditavyaḥ ||
S06n557:421: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi,
S06n557:422: tathā asaṃnāhasaṃnaddho batāyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ |
S06n557:426: akṛtā hi subhūte sarvajñatā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtā |
S06n557:438: atha khalvāyuṣmān pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-rūpamāyuṣman subhūte abaddhamamuktamiti vadasi |
S06n557:441: rūpatathatāpi āyuṣman subhūte abaddhā amukteti vadasi |
S06n557:444: atha katamattadāyuṣman subhūte rūpaṃ yadrūpamabaddhamamuktamiti vadasi?
S06n557:449: katamā sā āyuṣman subhūte rūpatathatā yā rūpatathatāpyabaddhā amukteti vadasi?
S06n557:450: evaṃ katamā sā vedanātathatā saṃjñātathatā saṃskāratathatā?
S06n557:451: katamā sā āyuṣman subhūte vijñānatathatā yā vijñānatathatāpyabaddhā amukteti vadasi?
S06n557:452: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ pūrṇaṃ maitrāyaṇīputrametadavocat-yadāyuṣman pūrṇa māyāpuruṣasya rūpaṃ tadabaddhamamuktam |
S06n557:457: yā āyuṣman pūrṇa māyāpuruṣasya rūpatathatā sā abaddhā amuktā |
S06n557:458: evaṃ yā māyāpuruṣasya vedanātathatā saṃjñātathatā saṃskāratathatā |
S06n557:459: yā āyuṣman pūrṇa māyāpuruṣasya vijñānatathatā sā abaddhā amuktā |
S06n557:464: ayaṃ sa bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya mahāyānasaṃprasthitasya mahāyānasamārūḍhasya mahāsaṃnāho'saṃnāhaḥ |
S06n557:466: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-evaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhaḥ san mahāyānasaṃprasthito mahāyānasamārūḍho bhavati |
S06n557:473: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-mahāyānamiti subhūte aprameyatāyā etadadhivacanam |
S06n557:475: yadapi subhūte evaṃ vadasi-kathaṃ vā tatsaṃprasthito veditavyaḥ?
S06n557:489: nāpi kaścittena mahāyānena niryāto nāpi niryāsyati nāpi niryāti |
S06n557:494: evamavidyamāneṣu sarvadharmeṣu katamo dharmaḥ katamena dharmeṇa niryāsyati?
S06n557:495: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasaṃnaddho mahāyānasaṃprasthito mahāyānasamārūḍho bhavati ||
S06n557:499: evameva bhagavan asmin yāne aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmavakāśaḥ |
S06n557:500: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa mahāyānamidaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām |
S06n557:504: evamasya bhagavan mahāyānasya naiva pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06n557:509: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāramadāt-sādhu sādhu subhūte |
S06n557:514: atha khalvāyuṣmān pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputro bhagavantametadavocat-ayaṃ bhagavan subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kṛtaśo'dhīṣṭo mahāyānamupadeṣṭavyaṃ manyate |
S06n557:515: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat-nāhaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ vyatikramya mahāyānamavocam |
S06n557:519: api nu khalu punarbhagavan pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06n557:531: evaṃ bhagavan sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ bodhisattvadharmamanupalabhamāno nāhaṃ bhagavan taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yasyaitannāmadheyaṃ yaduta bodhisattva iti |
S06n557:534: so'haṃ bhagavan sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ taṃ dharmamanupalabhamāno'samanupaśyan katamaṃ dharmaṃ katamena dharmeṇa katamasmin dharme'vavadiṣyāmi anuśāsiṣyāmi?
S06n557:548: na cānyatra bhagavan anabhinirvṛttitaḥ sarvadharmā vā buddhadharmā vā bodhisattvadharmā vā upalabhyante,
S06n557:550: sacedbhagavan evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe evaṃ deśyamāne evamupadiśyamāne bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na viṣīdati na viṣādamāpadyate,
S06n557:551: nāsya vipṛṣṭhībhavati mānasaṃ na bhagnapṛṣṭhībhavati notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate,
S06n557:557: yasmin hi samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ imān dharmān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vyupaparīkṣate,
S06n557:562: evaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān |
S06n557:568: tathā hi yo rūpasyānutpādo na tadrūpam |
S06n557:574: evaṃ tathā hi yo vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām |
S06n557:575: tathā hi yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tadvijñānam,
S06n557:581: evaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvākāraṃ sarvadharmān vyupaparīkṣamāṇaḥ tasmin samaye na rūpamupaiti,
S06n557:585: evaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān |
S06n557:591: tathā hi yo rūpasyānutpādo na tadrūpam |
S06n557:597: evaṃ tathā hi yo vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām |
S06n557:598: tathā hi yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tadvijñānam,
S06n557:604: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-tena hi yathāhamāyuṣmataḥ subhūterbhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi,
S06n557:606: yadi ca āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo'pyanutpādaḥ kiṃ bodhisattvo duṣkaracārikāṃ carati?
S06n557:607: yāni vā tāni sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo duḥkhānyutsahate pratyanubhavitum?
S06n557:608: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat-nāhamāyuṣman śāriputra icchāmi bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ duṣkaracārikāṃ carantam nāpi sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yo duṣkarasaṃjñayā carati |
S06n557:610: na hi āyuṣman śāriputra duṣkarasaṃjñāṃ janayitvā śakyo'prameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmarthaḥ kartum |
S06n557:612: sarvasattvānāmantike mātṛsaṃjñāṃ pitṛsaṃjñāṃ putrasaṃjñāṃ duhitṛsaṃjñāṃ kṛtvā strīpuruṣeṣu |
S06n557:613: evametāḥ saṃjñāḥ kṛtvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvacārikāṃ carati |
S06n557:614: tasmānmātṛsaṃjñā pitṛsaṃjñā putrasaṃjñā duhitṛsaṃjñā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvānāmantike yāvadātmasaṃjñā utpādayitavyā |
S06n557:615: yathā ātmā sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvaduḥkhebhyo mocayitavyaḥ,
S06n557:616: evaṃ sarvasattvāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvaduḥkhebhyo mocayitavyā iti |
S06n557:617: evaṃ ca sarvasattveṣu saṃjñā utpādayitavyā-mayaite sarvasattvā na parityaktavyāḥ |
S06n557:619: na ca mayaiteṣu cittapradoṣa utpādayitavya antaśaḥ śataśo'pi chidyamāneneti |
S06n557:620: evaṃ hi bodhisattvena mahāsattvena cittamutpādayitavyam sacedevaṃcitto vihariṣyati,
S06n557:623: punaraparamāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam-yathā sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvamātmā na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06n557:624: evaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvadharmā na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante |
S06n557:632: śāriputra āha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattva evānutpādaḥ,
S06n557:634: subhūtirāha-bodhisattvadharmā api āyuṣman śāriputra anutpādaḥ śāriputra āha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvadharmā evānutpādaḥ,
S06n557:646: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-yadyāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo'pyanutpādaḥ,
S06n557:652: nanvāyuṣman subhūte anuprāptaiva ayatnena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvajñatā bhavati |
S06n557:653: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat-nāhamāyuṣman śāriputra anutpannasya dharmasya prāptimicchāmi,
S06n557:656: āha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte anutpannena dharmeṇa anutpannā prāptiḥ prāpyate,
S06n557:657: utāho utpannena dharmeṇa anutpannā prāptiḥ prāpyate ?
S06n557:658: āha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anutpanno dharma utpannaḥ,
S06n557:660: āha-kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte utpāda eva dharmo'nutpādaḥ,
S06n557:662: āha-utpādo dharmo'nutpādo dharma ityāyuṣman śāriputra na pratibhāti jalpitum |
S06n557:663: āha-anutpādo'pi te āyuṣman subhūte pratibhāti jalpitum |
S06n557:668: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-dhārmakathikānāmāyuṣmān subhūtiragratāyāṃ sthāpitavyaḥ |
S06n557:670: tathā hyāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthaviro yato yata eva paripraśnīkriyate,
S06n557:674: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat-dharmataiṣā āyuṣman śāriputra bhagavataḥ śrāvakāṇāmaniśritadharmāṇām |
S06n557:681: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat-sādhu sādhu āyuṣman subhūte |
S06n557:685: iti hi yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāmevaṃ deśyamānāyāmevamupadiśyamānāyāṃ na bhavati cittasya avalīnatvam,
S06n557:689: veditavyamayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viharatyanena prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa avirahitaścānena manasikāreṇeti ||
S06n557:690: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmataṃ subhūtimetadavocat-kathamāyuṣman subhūte avirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'virahito manasikāreṇa bhavati,
S06n557:692: yadi hyāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'virahito manasikāreṇa bhavati,
S06n557:694: yadi ca āyuṣman subhūte avirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa bhavati,
S06n557:696: yadi ca āyuṣman subhūte manasikāreṇāvirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
S06n557:698: evaṃ sati sarvasattvā apyavirahitā bhaviṣyanti prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa |
S06n557:701: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat-sādhu sādhu āyuṣman śāriputra |
S06n557:703: artha eva tvāyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa bhūtapadābhidhānena parigṛhītaḥ |
S06n557:711: anena āyuṣman śāriputra evaṃrūpeṇa manasikāreṇa icchāmi bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ viharantamanena vihāreṇeti ||
